pull.title: refactor: Make httpserver work queue a unique_ptr
pull.body: This simplifies the code a bit because `if (p) { delete p; p = nullptr; }` can be replaced by a call to the `reset()` member.

events.message: refactor: Make httpserver work queue a unique_ptr

events.body:
Concept ACK.

> This simplifies the code a bit because `if (p) { delete p; p = nullptr; }` can be replaced by a call to the `reset()` member.

Just `delete p` would be fine, but agree `unique_ptr` is better.

Concept ACK

Nice to see another naked `new` get properly dressed :)
